txt.en: 'We must find Loknashra quickly, before this ritual can be completed!'
'Prepare yourself, Loknashra, to receive the spirit of Drugoth!'
'You cannot stop us, interlopers! I feel his presence!'
'Lok... Nash... Ra...'
'Come forth Drugoth, our lord and master!'
'I will not allow this Gaunt-lord to control me! ARGH!'
'Stop those spirits! I'll try to get this door open!'
'I will NEVER be controlled BY ANYONE!'
Do not allow the ritual to succeed
'Vessel?'
Defeat the Angmarim cultists
'This hobgoblin's body is strong, her mind powerful! Take it for your own!'
Talk to H贸rin
'I call upon the spirits! Open the way for the soul of the Gaunt-lord!'
'Lord Drugoth! I offer you this vessel! Rejoin us in the physical realm!'
Defeat the approaching fell spirits
Ugarad the Harbinger intends to perform a secret ritual to impart the strength of the Gauntlord Drugoth to Loknashra of the Frost-bound. You and H贸rin must stop this ritual before it is too late!
'You... deceived me? NO!'
'AND I WILL SLAY YOU ALL FOR THIS BETRAYAL!'
The Angmarim are attempting a ritual that will empower Loknashra!\n\nYou should defeat the approaching fell spirits!
'No! The ritual is not complete!'
The Angmarim are attempting a ritual that will empower Loknashra!\n\nYou should defeat the cultists performing the ritual!
H贸rin is ready to stop the ritual taking place in Bagud-dum.\n\nYou should talk to H贸rin.
'The door is open! We must stop the ritual!'
'Ugh, my head! We made it outside. Are you all right?'
Instance: The Secret Ritual
